017package com.fns.grivet.controller;
018
019import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
020import org.json.JSONArray;
021import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
022import org.springframework.http.MediaType;
023import org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;
024import org.springframework.security.access.prepost.PreAuthorize;
025import org.springframework.util.Assert;
026import org.springframework.util.MultiValueMap;
027import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.DeleteMapping;
028import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.GetMapping;
029import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.PathVariable;
030import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.PostMapping;
031import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestBody;
032import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
033import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestParam;
034import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController;
035import org.springframework.web.util.UriComponentsBuilder;
036import com.fns.grivet.query.NamedQuery;
037import com.fns.grivet.query.QueryType;
038import com.fns.grivet.service.NamedQueryService;
039
040/**
041 * Provides end-points for registration, verification and execution of named queries
042 * 
043 * @author Chris Phillipson
044 */
045@RestController
046@RequestMapping(consumes = MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_VALUE, produces = MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_VALUE)
047public class NamedQueryController {
048    @SuppressWarnings("all")
049    private static final org.slf4j.Logger log = org.slf4j.LoggerFactory.getLogger(NamedQueryController.class);
050    private final NamedQueryService namedQueryService;
051
052    @Autowired
053    public NamedQueryController(NamedQueryService namedQueryService) {
054        this.namedQueryService = namedQueryService;
055    }
056
057    @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'write:query\')")
058    @PostMapping("/query")
059    public ResponseEntity<?> createNamedQuery(@RequestBody NamedQuery query) {
060        ResponseEntity<?> result = ResponseEntity.unprocessableEntity().build();
061        Assert.isTrue(StringUtils.isNotBlank(query.getName()), "Query name must not be null, empty or blank.");
062        Assert.notNull(query.getQuery(), "Query string must not be null!");
063        Assert.isTrue(isSupportedQuery(query), "Query must start with either CALL or SELECT");
064        // check for named parameters; but only if they exist
065        if (!query.getParams().isEmpty()) {
066            query.getParams().keySet().forEach(k -> Assert.isTrue(query.getQuery().contains(String.format(":%s", k)), String.format("Query must contain named parameter [%s]", k)));
067        }
068        namedQueryService.create(query);
069        log.info("Named Query \n\n{}\n\n successfully registered!", query);
070        UriComponentsBuilder ucb = UriComponentsBuilder.newInstance();
071        if (query.getParams().isEmpty()) {
072            result = ResponseEntity.created(ucb.path("/query/{name}").buildAndExpand(query.getName()).toUri()).build();
073        } else {
074            result = ResponseEntity.noContent().build();
075        }
076        return result;
077    }
078
079    @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'execute:query\')")
080    @GetMapping("/query/{name}")
081    public ResponseEntity<?> executeNamedQuery(@PathVariable("name") String name, @RequestParam MultiValueMap<String, ?> parameters) {
082        return ResponseEntity.ok(namedQueryService.get(name, parameters));
083    }
084
085    @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'list:query\')")
086    @GetMapping("/queries")
087    public ResponseEntity<?> listNamedQueries() {
088        JSONArray payload = namedQueryService.all();
089        return ResponseEntity.ok(payload.toString());
090    }
091
092    @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'delete:query\')")
093    @DeleteMapping("/query/{name}")
094    public ResponseEntity<?> deleteNamedQuery(@PathVariable("name") String name) {
095        namedQueryService.delete(name);
096        log.info("Query with name [{}] successfully deleted!", name);
097        return ResponseEntity.noContent().build();
098    }
099
100    private boolean isSupportedQuery(NamedQuery query) {
101        boolean result = false;
102        if ((query.getQuery().toUpperCase().startsWith("SELECT") && query.getType().equals(QueryType.SELECT)) || (query.getQuery().toUpperCase().startsWith("CALL") && query.getType().equals(QueryType.SPROC))) {
103            result = true;
104        }
105        return result;
106    }
107}
